text:
Use the e-prescription app now to record your decision to donate organs in the **digital organ donation register** – safely and easily. 
 
 There are currently 9,192 people in Germany urgently waiting for an organ – every decision counts and can save lives. 
 
 Make your decision today and make an important contribution to the future of many people! ❤️‍🩹 
 
 You can find the organ donation register in the “Settings” tab in this app.

**Improved readability** 
 We've made our brand color a little darker to increase color contrast and thereby improve readability. 
 
 **Optimized features** 
 We've updated the format of the submission dates and corrected the sorting of the messages.
